thread.title: Northgate advances to face Ola in Area 4- tournament
thread.title_full: Northgate advances to face Ola in Area 4- tournament

title: Northgate advances to face Ola in Area 4- tournament
text:
Comments 
Northgate's volleyball team advanced in the Area 4- tournament with a pair of sweep, beating Union Grove 25-21, 25-19 and Mundy's Mill 25-19, 25-7. 
With the win, the Lady Vikings - now 2 4 - 1 7 overall - advanced to meet Ola today at 12 p.m. 
Against Un i on Grove, Northgate was led offensively by junior Katie Stanton's 11 kills. Senior Taylor Richard added seven, as the Lady Vikings finished with 27 as a team. 
Northgate posted seven aces in the opening win along with a whopping nine blocks. Senior middle hitter Savannah Moore had four, while Richard and junior Kia Thomas each had two. Senior Cara Rhoad had nine blocks and Richard finished with six. Junior Morgan Marshall had 16 assists and sophomore Emily Dozier added 11. 
Northgate had seven aces in the victory. The Lady Vikings opened tournament play Wednesday by dominating Mundy's Mill with a balanced attack. Richard, Stanton and Moore combined for 21 of Northgate's 24 kills in the match, while Marshall posted team highs of six aces and 14 digs. More
